data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 6,958 believers in Villalba and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Villalba, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 6,958 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Villalba.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Villalba, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
God, guide the 6,958 believers in Villalba to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Villalba.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Villalba, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Villalba, Puerto Rico, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,958 believers in Villalba against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Villalba, Puerto Rico has a population of 21,400.

We estimate Villalba has 6,958 people who might know Jesus, 13,275 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,167 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
